author: apetrelli
msg: Removed some useless files and directories.

author: dumindu
msg: Added a bat file to copy rampart modules and samples into the axis2 repo, after rampart is built on win32 platform.

author: gsingers
msg: Changed BoostingTermQuery to score all occurrences of the term in a document by making the underlying setFreqCurrentDoc() method protected so that it can be overridden in BTQ.  Updated the tests to have multiple terms per document with different payloads, so that it can be averaged.

author: amilas
msg: set the END_ELEMENT event instead of END_DOCUMENT
